00022 #ifndef REPOSITORY_H
00023 #define REPOSITORY_H
00024 
00025 #include <libxml/tree.h>
00026 #include <vector>
00027 #include <string>
00028 #include "Package.h"
00029 #include "PackageIndex.h"
00030 
00032 typedef enum
00033 {
00034   REPO_DIR_NOT_SPECIFIED,
00035   REPO_FILE_MISSING,
00036   REPO_FILE_FORMAT_ERROR,
00037   REPO_FILE_NOT_WRITABLE,
00038   REPO_OK
00039 } RepositoryStatusType;
00040 
00041 using std::vector;
00042 using std::string;
00043 
00045 class Repository
00046 {
00047 public:
00048   Repository();
00049   ~Repository();
00050   RepositoryStatusType Save() const;
00051   RepositoryStatusType Load(string direcotry);
00052   Package* FindMostCurrentPackage(string packageName, const PackageDependency *dependency=NULL);
00053   Package* GetPackage(string packageName, string revision);
00054   Package* GetPrecedingPackage(string packageName, string revision);
00055   string GetDirectory() const;
00056   void SetDirectory(string directory);
00057   bool AddPackage(Package* package);
00058   int NumPackages() const;
00059   string GetPackageName(int packageIndex) const;
00060   string Synchronize();
00061   bool SetSyncProtocol(string protocol);
00062   bool SetSyncLocation(string location);
00063   bool IsLocal() const;
00064 private:
00066   string mSyncProtocol;
00068   string mSyncLocation;
00070   string mDirectory;
00072   PackageIndexVector mPackages;
00073 };

00075 typedef vector<Repository *> RepositoryVector;
